intro: In a heartbeat, the ordinary becomes legendary. In a world of fantasy, where will your destiny and love lead?
description:
The Story:

On your way home from work, a sudden bolt of lightning changes everything. You wake up to find yourself in a strange new land... a world reminiscent of medieval Europe?!

Before you can even get your bearings, you are falsely accused of being the reincarnation of the Evil Witch Queen and dragged off to the royal castle.

Your pleas of innocence fall on deaf ears. With suspicion hanging over you, you are forced to make a choice: select one of five enchanting heroes - who look as if they stepped straight out of a fairy tale - to be your warden and keep watch over you...

Why were you summoned to this world? As you unravel the mysteries binding you here, where will this unexpected love lead?

Characters:

August (The Knight)
Iseul (The Elf Prince)
Saerys (The Demon)
Altea (The Wizard)
Reiner (The Lord)
Helena (The Sorceress)
Alain (The Knight General)

Contents: Main Stories from the app "Lovestruck: Choose Your Romance" up until Season 5.
